Major_Arcs.title: Circus Spectacle and Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Paul Bunyan in a circus setting, transitions to public wonder at the circus, and then quickly escalates into a conflict involving intervention, attack, and a job offer.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction and Public Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and then shifts to the arrival of the circus in town and the public's amazed reaction to the spectacle.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Escalating Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a man intervening in a threatening situation and then facing a sudden escalation of danger with the appearance of a pistol.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Threat with a Pistol and Injury

sub_scenes.title: Explanation, Assessment, and Opportunity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the aftermath of the attack, with the circus owner explaining the situation, assessing Paul Bunyan, and offering him a job.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of Matto Grasso and Invitation to the Circus
Job Offer as the New Strong Man

Major_Arcs.title: Matto Grasso's Vengeful Acts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Matto Grasso's escalating attempts to sabotage Paul Bunyan and the circus, driven by envy and hatred, leading to arson and the release of a dangerous animal.

sub_scenes.title: Performance, Envy, and Arson Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage for Matto Grasso's revenge, showing Paul Bunyan's successful performance, Matto Grasso's envious reaction, and his initial arson plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Chaos and the Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Matto Grasso's next act of revenge - releasing Gigantico - and the ensuing chaos and pursuit by the circus guard.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Foul Deed: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico Escapes and the Pursuit Begins

Major_Arcs.title: Circus Brawl and Paul's Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays a separate spectacle within the circus, a brawl, which Paul Bunyan resolves, leading to a job offer that he ultimately declines, choosing to return to his original life.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Arena Brawl
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a public brawl in the circus arena, observed by spectators who are unsure if it is part of the act.

sub_scenes.title: Job Rejection and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Paul Bunyan's circus storyline with a job offer and his decision to reject it, opting to return to the North Woods.

narrative_arcs.title: Job Offer and North Woods Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's encounter with the supernatural Ogress of Tibet, starting from a mysterious encounter and leading to capture and escape using a magic dagger.

sub_scenes.title: Mysterious Encounters and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo and shifts to a new character discovering a severed talking head in a forest, setting a supernatural tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Rescue, Magic Weapon, and Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Marco Polo rescuing a tied man who gifts him a magic dagger, followed by Marco Polo's arrival at a city in mourning.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Rescues a Tied Man and Receives a Magic Dagger

sub_scenes.title: Princess's Disappearance and Witch's Castle Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Marco Polo meeting the King and learning about Princess Lotus's disappearance, leading him to a deceptive encounter with a woman and a witch's castle.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Meets the King of Hi-toun and Learns of Princess Lotus's Disappearance
The Woman in Distress and the Witch's Castle
Entering the Castle and the Ogress's Trap
Combat with Monstrous Rats and Defiance Against the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Ogre's Captivity and Escape with Magic Dagger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a seemingly unrelated narrative of a swordsman captured by a villain, then transitions to a bound man and woman escaping an ogre using a magic knife.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to the Father

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc, narrated by a Treasure Keeper, tells a tale of betrayal and revenge centered around a hidden treasure from Agra, India, starting in a penal colony and ending in a violent confrontation in England.

sub_scenes.title: Story Setup and Penal Colony Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Treasure Keeper as narrator and sets the scene in a British penal colony where a prisoner offers a deal for freedom in exchange for treasure information.

narrative_arcs.title: The Map and the Escape Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal, Revenge, and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the betrayal by Captain Brooking, the vow of revenge, Jordan's release and return to England, and the eventual confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Furious Denial and Vow of Revenge
Years Later: Release and Return to England
Jordan's Vigil and Brooking's Unaware Planning
Journey to the Attic and Betrayal
Police Respond to Gunshot and Find Wounded Man
Police Observation and Call for Homicide Squad

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate of Vincent Matthews
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx's investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, dealing with the vengeful ghost of Vincent Matthews and concluding with a moral lesson about fear and hate.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Haunted Case
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx in a dramatic scene and then transitions to Henry Northrup seeking his help with the haunted Matthews estate.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at the Haunted Estate and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the arrival at the Matthews estate, a dire warning, and the initial ominous welcome from Vincent Matthews' ghost.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Warning at Matthews Estate
Disregarding the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Redemption through Forgiveness and Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to a moralistic interlude about violence and fear, leading to a path of salvation through forgiveness and brotherly love, culminating in the resolution of Vincent Matthews' torment.

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Search for Salvation
The Sister's Forgiveness and Murder Revelation
Summoning of Rosalind and Her Arrival
Request for Forgiveness and its Granting
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Ill-Fated Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, focusing on his quest for the Northwest Passage, the challenges faced by his crew, and the tragic mutiny that led to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Context and First Voyage
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a historical overview of Henry Hudson and then details the proposition for his first voyage to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition
Weeks at Sea and Talk of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Mutiny, and Fate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hudson's second voyage, the crew getting trapped in ice, growing dissent, and the eventual mutiny leading to Hudson being cast adrift.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage for the Northern Passage
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement on Course

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Rescue of the Princess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Arabian Knight, Hassan, on a mission to rescue a kidnapped princess, involving a journey through the desert, infiltration of a Tartar camp, and a duel for her freedom.

sub_scenes.title: The Summons and the Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Arabian Knight, Hassan, and his summons by the Caliph to undertake a rescue mission to save a kidnapped princess.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Warning and Revelation at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Contact with the Captive
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's infiltration of the Tartar camp, his strategy to overcome a sentry, and his initial attempt to contact the princess.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery, Combat, and Duel Challenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's discovery by guards, the ensuing fight, and his capture leading to a duel challenge by Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: The Duel and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the duel itself, Hassan's unconventional tactics, his near defeat, Kurgan honoring his word, and the budding romance with the Princess.

narrative_arcs.title: Swift Defeat of the First Opponent
